text: Aleksei Viktorovich Ostayev (; born 23 March 1973) is a former Russian football player. He played two games as a goalkeeper for FC Gofrokarton Digora in 1996. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Spartak Vladikavkaz players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Association football forwards Category:FC Spartak-UGP Anapa players
title: Aleksei Ostayev
